channel.title: 2 questions
channel.description:
first 1 is, how do i change training speed? in my server atm, 3 hits on range gets you 99.. i wanted to change it so you only gain like 50k exp every time you hit it, how would i do this?
also how do i make words rainbow? like "bank of smokesome" is in white with @whi@ what do i put to make it rain bow? i thought it was rai but it isnt :(

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @owner_Ethan owner Ethan
item.description:
@owner_Ethan wrote:

mm less then u atleast

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

owner Ethan:

ur spamming makes me smarter, jackass and err yea i need to learn how to quote ur ancient nob language

I’m not spamming, I’m replying to your rude comment. FYI, me speaking in proper English is not ‘ancient nob language’ - what ever that is. If my post are making you smarter, by all means keep reading them, from what I’ve seen from you thus far, you have alot to learn.

Now stop posting, his question has been answered. Your little war that you want to start here is ended.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 questions
item.dc:creator: @owner_Ethan owner Ethan
item.description:
@owner_Ethan wrote:

[quote=“exe626, post:3, topic:131025”][quote author=owner Ethan link=topic=181727.msg1658040#msg1658040 date=1186489728]
what source do u have ?
[/quote]This is complete spam.
you are complete dumb

  1. I would look for the amount of exp you get per hit(go in game, hit one time and write down the exp), go into your source files and press ‘ctrl+f’ and type in the exp, and change it.
  2. If its only @whi@Bank of Smokesome@whi@ and you want it to rainbow-ish. You would do something like

@whi@B@red@a@pur@n@yel@k
so on and so forth.[/quote]

Read full topic

  1. I would look for the amount of exp you get per hit(go in game, hit one time and write down the exp), go into your source files and press ‘ctrl+f’ and type in the exp, and change it.
  2. If its only @whi@Bank of Smokesome@whi@ and you want it to rainbow-ish. You would do something like

@whi@B@red@a@pur@n@yel@k
so on and so forth.
